# Hello

----

I'm here to introduce you to one of my favorite application that I use on a daily

---
![bg 90%](https://www.steem.center/images/6/62/Discord_Color_Logo.png)

---
### What company makes it?

Discord is owned by a private company called Discord Inc.
![height:350](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/sanicman/images/c/ca/Concours-discord-cartes-voeux-fortnite-france-6.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/1000?cb=20191015023221)

---

![bg right](http://www.billfrymire.com/gallery/weblarge/earth-globe-Asia-connect-network.jpg)
### Why do you like it?

Discord is easy to use and allows me to connect to people from all over the world

---


### How much does it cost or does it even cost anything?

Discord does not cost a penny to install
However, you an get Discord Nitro for either $3.99, or $12.99 each with different perks

![height:340](https://blog.offgamers.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/1-1.jpg)

---

### Where can you get it?

You can either get it from the app store, or from your website, just go to https://discord.com/ and download it.

![bg left](https://techcrunch.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/GettyImages-1215460368-e1702491102983.jpg?w=1390&crop=1)

---

### Where is their main ofice?

Discord's main office is at 444 De Haro Street, San Francisco

![bg right:60%](https://i0.wp.com/news.theregistrysf.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/De-Haro-Place1.jpg?fit=874%2C845&ssl=1)

---
### Who are their competitors?

Discord competes with all group chats, such as Miscrosoft teams, Skype, Teamspeak, and Slack
However, only a few of the competitors have a voice chat

![height:340](https://www.chanty.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/Discord-alternatives-740x379.png)

---

# Cool facts

--- 

### Bonfire

![bg](https://preview.redd.it/7224d60aw4w51.png?width=662&format=png&auto=webp&s=34b8530c3a67c5a8702096b31a627abac38df29d)

![height:350](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/89/HD_transparent_picture.png/1280px-HD_transparent_picture.png)

Discord was orignally going to be called bonfire since it was supposed to be a nice and cozy place to hang out.

---

![bg right 105%](data:image/png;base64,)

### Users

From the year 2019 to 2021, the number of discord users jumped from 56 million to 140 million, almost tripling in users.

---

![bg left](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/discord/images/0/0d/Clyde_%28sticker%29.svg/revision/latest?cb=20211126184816)

### Clyde

Clyde was discord's first bot who responded to specific slash commands.
It later turned into a chatbot on March 3rd, 2023 before getting shut down at the end of the year.
